scripts.compose: npm run start cases/compose/context.tsx && npm run start cases/compose/forward-style.tsx && npm run start cases/compose/stable.tsx
scripts.hydration: npm run start cases/hydration/with-hydration.tsx && npm run start cases/hydration/without-hydration.tsx
scripts.simple: npm run start cases/simple/current.tsx && npm run start cases/simple/stable.tsx
scripts.all: npm run compose && npm run simple && npm run vanilla
